message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $9,000.  Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand you're looking for a good deal. However, $7,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $8,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,250. Can you consider that?
